SEARCH
Package fang2.attributes

Class Vector2D

java.lang.Object
fang2.attributes.Vector2D
public class Vector2D extends Object
This class represents a vector (direction and magnitude) within some space.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Vector2D()
    Construct a default vector: facing and magnitude 0.
    Vector2D(double degrees, double magnitude)
    Construct a new Vector2D with the given facing and magnitude.
    Vector2D(Location2D location)
    Construct a vector representing the given location (translates to angle/magnitude).
    Vector2D(Location2D source, Location2D target)
    Construct a vector representing the difference between the two given locations
    Vector2D(Vector2D other)
    Copy the value of the other vector
